participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, Alex loves to skate and is always up for an adventure.
participant_1.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Determined and fitness-focused, Jordan finds joy in maintaining a healthy lifestyle and enjoys spending time with her dogs.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.
